name: Castle Below
description:
Deep underground lies an ancient castle, filled with terrifying monsters. Built by an unknown civilization, it holds untold treasures and secrets. 

Those who dare to enter must face the deadly creatures within and overcome the castle's dangerous challenges to uncover its riches.

Play as one of the 5 available classes and explore the castle beneath the surface in this turn-based Roguelike game!

FEATURES

  • Simple gameplay (no previous experience with Roguelikes required!)
  • Infinite floors and progression
  • Gamepad Support
  • Couch co-op
  • Online leaderboard
